// All pretty empty and selfexplanatory
import axios from'axios';var baseURL="/api/persons/";var getAllPersons=function getAllPersons(){return axios.get(baseURL);};var postPerson=function postPerson(person){return axios.post(baseURL,person);};var rmPerson=function rmPerson(person){return axios.delete(baseURL+person.id);};var changePerson=function changePerson(person,newPerson){return axios.put(baseURL+person.id,newPerson);};var personsService={getAllPersons:getAllPersons,postPerson:postPerson,rmPerson:rmPerson,changePerson:changePerson};export default personsService;
